scripts.name: zoro autofocus
scripts.description: After the you finish an episode, zoro automatically goes to the next episode but the video player loses focus. This script focuses on the video player automatically for you. (you can use keyboard shortcuts without clicking on the video player).
scripts.license: Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial Share Alike 4.0 International
